mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee asks that his regrets be offered to Miss Norvell's parents, as he has to decline their invitation to stay with them during his trip to Richmond. Lee had received a subpoena to appear in "Mr. Davis'" U.S. District Court case. This is presumably Jefferson Davis.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Caskie, M. Norvell
Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870 -- Family
Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889 -- Trials, litigation, etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from R. E. Lee to Miss Martha Norvell Caskie, November 22, 1867 (correspondence)
